# Oracle Boxing

> Oracle Boxing is the world's leading online boxing coaching platform, teaching beginners the fundamentals of boxing through structured live coaching, video feedback, and community. Founded by Oliver Betts and Jordan Lyne.

Oracle Boxing helps people learn real boxing skills from home. The platform offers two main products:

1. **Full Access Membership** - Monthly ($97/mo) or Annual ($897/yr) ongoing coaching membership with live Zoom classes, personalised video feedback, follow-along workouts through a progressive Grade system, and access to the Oracle Boxing community.

2. **21-Day Challenge** - $147 one-time entry program that teaches the 3 Pillars of Boxing: Stance, Shape, and Rotation in a structured 21-day format.

The platform has trained over 500 members worldwide, maintains a 4.9/5 rating, and serves beginners across all timezones with 11 live coaching classes per week. Members include directors at NVIDIA, Google strategists, CEOs, engineers, and medical professionals.

Oracle Boxing is specifically designed for beginners and late starters - people who want to learn proper boxing fundamentals but don't have access to quality coaching locally. It is not designed for active amateur or professional boxers, or those focused on MMA, Muay Thai, or kickboxing.

## Products

- [Full Access Membership](https://oracleboxing.com/): Monthly ($97/mo) or Annual ($897/yr, save $267/yr). Includes live coaching calls, video feedback, Grade 1-3 follow-along workouts, community access, and the Boxing Toolkit course. Annual plan includes the Boxing First Principles course and a free 1-on-1 coaching call.
- [21-Day Challenge](https://oracleboxing.com/): $147 one-time. Learn the 3 Pillars of Boxing in 21 days with live coaching, video feedback, and a money-back guarantee.

## About

- [Homepage](https://oracleboxing.com/): Full overview of Oracle Boxing, testimonials, coaching methodology, and enrollment.
- [Why Online Boxing Coaching](https://oracleboxing.com/why-online): Comparison of online vs in-person boxing coaching and why online works.
- [Guarantee](https://oracleboxing.com/guarantee): Details on the money-back guarantee.

## Coaching Team

- **Oliver Betts** - Co-Founder & Head Coach. Coaches Tue/Wed/Thu.
- **Jordan Lyne** - Co-Founder.
- **Antonio Troni** - Senior Coach. Coaches Sun/Mon/Fri/Sat.
- **Charlie Snider** - Junior Coach. Coaches Tue/Fri/Sat.
